 Airdopes 500 ANC

Focus on what matters with Airdopes 500 ANC that helps you tap out of chaos. Block unwanted background noise up to 35dB with its Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation. Make your calls crystal clear with the power of Quad Mics and ENx™ Technology. With a promising 28 HRS of playback, it is time to listen to the #SoundThatMatters with Airdopes 500 ANC.

SHOP NOW
Stone 352

Stone 352 will make you & your gang groove nonstop! Get ready to dive into an immersive listening experience like never before with its 10W Stereo boAt Signature Sound. Whether it's raining or you are chilling beside a pool, this ultra-portable speaker is equipped with IPX7 Splash & Water Shield. So set for a seamless play & great grooving sesh!

SHOP NOW
Watch Wave Lite

Experience superior display with Watch Wave Lite that offers 1.69” HD Display and 550 Nits brightness. Interact using a vibrant screen with 160 degree view angle and 70% RGB color gamut as you use it for hours without discomfort, for it weighs only 44.8GMS.
